text: An opiate is any of the narcotic alkaloids found in opium. Opiate may also refer to: * Opiate, an alias of Danish musician and producer Thomas Knak * Opiate (EP), an EP and title track by progressive rock band Tool * "Opiate" (song), a song by the rock band Tool ==See also== * "Opiated", a song by The Tragically Hip from the album Up to Here * List of opioids * Opioid epidemic
title: Opiate (disambiguation)
